source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video begins with a close-up of a dark door in a dimly lit room, with a light switch and framed pictures on the walls. As the camera moves backward, more of the room becomes visible, including a table with a lamp, a framed picture, and a small decorative item. The camera continues to pull back, revealing a bench with a pair of shoes on the floor next to it. The room is decorated with two framed pictures on the walls, one on the left and one on the right, and a small table with a lamp and other decorative items on the left side.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
source_caption_data.final_caption: The video begins with a close-up of a dark door in a dimly lit room, with a light switch and framed pictures on the walls. As the camera moves backward, more of the room becomes visible, including a table with a lamp, a framed picture, and a small decorative item. The room is decorated with two framed pictures on the walls, one on the left and one on the right, and a small table with a lamp and other decorative items on the left side.

generated_critique: The caption contains a factual error and is not concise. The video does not show "a pair of shoes on the floor," so this detail should be removed. The final sentence, "The room is decorated with two framed pictures on the walls, one on the left and one on the right, and a small table with a lamp and other decorative items on the left side," is redundant, as it repeats information already provided as the camera moved. This sentence should be deleted to adhere to the instruction to be concise and focus on motion.
